name: 尸如潮水
description: 开放世界探险解谜类游戏（末日丧尸，第三人称射击游戏）
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Win7，64位系统 Processor: I5 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: 750 Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: W10，64位系统 Processor: I7 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: 1050 Storage: 2 GB available space
